TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509Store extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class X509Store Implements IDisposable
public ref class X509Store sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 X.509 存储，该存储是保留和管理证书的物理存储。

span.span: Represents an X.509 store, which is a physical store where certificates are persisted and managed.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类可以使用 X.509 存储。Use this class to work with an X.509 store. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，则此类型实现接口。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 对于面向的应用[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]及早期版本、类未实现接口，并因此不具有`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何可在每个打开标准 X.509 存储区和列表的证书的数目。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书的范围。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **示例 1****Example 1** 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它将输出显示是否每个存储存在并且，如果数因此，证书它包含的摘要。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 该示例创建标准名称和标准位置的每个组合的对象。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它调用方法替换标志，仅当它已存在打开的物理存储。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果存在物理存储，该示例使用， ，和属性，以显示存储区中的证书的数目。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **示例 2****Example 2** 此示例打开 X.509 证书存储区、 将添加和删除证书，，然后关闭该存储区。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建对象使用当前用户的个人的 X.509 证书存储。Use this constructor to create an object using the personal X.509 certificate store for the current user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数提供非托管与 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的兼容性。Use this constructor to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 有关详细信息`HCERTSTORE`处理，请参阅的平台 SDK 部分中的非托管的 CAPI 文档[MSDN 库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建对象，指定的存储位置，这是当前用户的位置或本地计算机。Use this constructor to create an object, specifying the store location, which is either the location for the current user or the local computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建对象使用当前用户的特定 X.509 存储名称。Use this constructor to create an object using a particular X.509 store name for the current user. 若要创建新存储，请指定不存在的名称。To create a new store, specify a name that does not exist. 将具有该名称创建了新的存储区。A new store will be created with that name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. span.span: Adds a collection of certificates to an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将多个证书添加到 X.509 证书存储区;如果一个证书添加失败，此操作将恢复并不添加任何证书。This method adds more than one certificate to an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate addition fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are added. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificates As X509Certificate2Collection

summary.span: 返回位于 X.509 证书存储中的证书集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of certificates located in an X.509 certificate store.
A collection of certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的 X.509 证书存储区的快照。This method returns a snapshot of the X.509 certificate store. 请注意，后续或存储区上执行的操作不会产生任何影响返回的集合。Note that subsequent or operations performed on the store will not have any effect on the collection that is returned. 此快照是每次重新计算的属性称为，因此建议不要将此属性在迭代函数内使用。This snapshot is recalculated each time the property is called, so the use of this property inside an iterative function is not recommended. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何可在每个打开标准 X.509 存储区和列表的证书的数目。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书的范围。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **示例 1****Example 1** 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它将输出显示是否每个存储存在并且，如果数因此，证书它包含的摘要。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 该示例创建标准名称和标准位置的每个组合的对象。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它调用方法替换标志，仅当它已存在打开的物理存储。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果存在物理存储，该示例使用， ，和属性，以显示存储区中的证书的数目。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **示例 2****Example 2** 此示例打开 X.509 证书存储区、 将添加和删除证书，，然后关闭该存储区。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭 X.509 证书存储。

span.span: Closes an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法释放与应用商店关联的所有资源。This method releases all resources associated with the store. 你应在使用后始终关闭 X.509 证书存储。You should always close an X.509 certificate store after use. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 实现开头的接口[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，类未实现此接口，因此`Dispose`方法不存在。 implements the interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the class does not implement this interface, and therefore the `Dispose` method does not exist.

Public ReadOnly Property Location As StoreLocation

summary.span: 获取 X.509 证书存储的位置。

span.span: Gets the location of the X.509 certificate store.
The location of the certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的 X.509 证书存储位置为当前用户存储或本地计算机存储。This property returns the X.509 certificate store location of either the store for the current user or the store for the local computer. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何可在每个打开标准 X.509 存储区和列表的证书的数目。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书的范围。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **示例 1****Example 1** 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它将输出显示是否每个存储存在并且，如果数因此，证书它包含的摘要。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 该示例创建标准名称和标准位置的每个组合的对象。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它调用方法替换标志，仅当它已存在打开的物理存储。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果存在物理存储，该示例使用， ，和属性，以显示存储区中的证书的数目。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **示例 2****Example 2** 此示例打开 X.509 证书存储区、 将添加和删除证书，，然后关闭该存储区。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 X.509 证书存储的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the X.509 certificate store.
The name of the certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的 X.509 证书存储名称。This property returns the X.509 certificate store name. 此值可以指示证书存储，例如根证书或来自受信任的发行者的证书的类型。This value can indicate the type of certificates stored, such as root certificates or certificates from trusted publishers. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何可在每个打开标准 X.509 存储区和列表的证书的数目。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书的范围。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **示例 1****Example 1** 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它将输出显示是否每个存储存在并且，如果数因此，证书它包含的摘要。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 该示例创建标准名称和标准位置的每个组合的对象。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它调用方法替换标志，仅当它已存在打开的物理存储。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果存在物理存储，该示例使用， ，和属性，以显示存储区中的证书的数目。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **示例 2****Example 2** 此示例打开 X.509 证书存储区、 将添加和删除证书，，然后关闭该存储区。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Open(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags flags) cil managed

param.name: flags
param.span: 一个枚举值的按位组合，它指定 X.509 证书存储的打开方式。

span.span: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that specifies the way to open the X.509 certificate store.

summary.span: 根据 标志设置，打开 X.509 证书存储或创建一个新存储。

span.span: Opens an X.509 certificate store or creates a new store, depending on flag settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以打开一个现有 X.509 存储区。Use this method to open an existing X.509 store. 请注意，你必须具有由指定的其他权限，枚举存储区中的证书。Note that you must have additional permissions, specified by , to enumerate the certificates in the store. 你可以通过将不存在的存储名称传递给类构造函数，，然后使用任一创建新存储标志除。You can create a new store by passing a store name that does not exist to the class constructor, and then using any of the flags except . ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从 X.509 证书存储移除证书。

span.span: Removes a certificate from an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于从 X.509 存储区中删除一个证书。Use this method to remove a single certificate from an X.509 store. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

span.span: A range of certificates to remove.

summary.span: 从 X.509 证书存储移除一系列证书。

span.span: Removes a range of certificates from an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 此方法从 X.509 证书存储区; 中删除多个证书如果一个证书删除失败，此操作将恢复并不删除任何证书。This method removes more than one certificate from an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate removal fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

A handle to an store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来提供非托管与 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的兼容性。Use the property to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 有关详细信息`HCERTSTORE`处理，请参阅的平台 SDK 部分中的非托管的 CAPI 文档[MSDN 库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

span.span: The store is not open.
for unmanaged code.
